metadata.title: Outer Continental Shelf Environmental Assessment Program (OCSEAP) Bibliography
metadata.description: A compilation of publications and reports that have resulted from scientific research on the marine and coastal environment of Alaska during the period of 1975-1988.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To list publications and reports that have resulted from scientific research on the marine and coastal environment of Alaska.  The bibliography is available at Alaska libraries and is updated periodically.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None
